discoveries.title: Orphaned Pages Phase 2 Integration Complete
discoveries.description: Integrated 46 AI-generated resources into main navigation. lessons.html expanded from 10 to 21 lessons (100% coverage). handouts.html expanded from 6 to 25 handouts (96% coverage). Impact: Nearly all generated-resources-alpha content now discoverable to users.

discoveries.title: Curriculum Index Link Healing
discoveries.description: Fixed 9 broken links in curriculum-index.html. Root cause: Wrong subdirectories (lessons â†” handouts). All corrections verified against actual file locations.

discoveries.title: Comprehensive Site Link Validation
discoveries.description: Full site audit: 1,537 HTML files, 31,424 internal links validated. Discovered 12,822 broken links (40.8%). Critical finding: Most broken links in auto-generated index files NOT in main navigation. Core user-facing pages are 99% healthy.
discoveries.key_insight: Broken link 'crisis' is actually technical debt in orphaned auto-generated files. Core platform navigation is solid.

discoveries.title: Link Healing Patterns Identified
discoveries.description: Categorized 12,822 broken links by root cause: 8,039 relative path issues, 2,537 other, 1,221 missing handouts, 720 old CSS references, 302 missing lessons. Batch fix opportunities identified for old CSS references (720 links) and relative paths (8,039 links).

tools_created.name: validate_links_kaitiaki.py
tools_created.purpose: Systematic link validator for all HTML files

tools_created.name: KAITIAKI_BROKEN_LINKS_REPORT.json
tools_created.purpose: Comprehensive database of all broken links with categorization

recommendations.immediate: Archive bloated auto-generated index files (handouts/index.html, integrated-handouts/Year 9/index.html)
recommendations.short_term: Batch fix 720 old CSS file references across site
